programme.title: Meja Panggang Ep03

programme.title: Potong Ep03

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak Series Ep11

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: the Close
programme.desc: This fast-paced programme is the quintessential market close show leading up to the final minutes and seconds before the closing bell on Wall Street with the latest news, data and expert analysis.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: What'd You Miss?
programme.desc: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Australia
programme.desc: From New York and Sydney, the latest news impacting markets, business and finance around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
programme.desc: From New York and Hong Kong, the essential stories from the close of the US markets to the open of trading across Asia.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
programme.desc: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: From Dubai, connecting Asian markets to the European opens - this show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Market reports from London and overnight news from Wall Street - markets never sleep, and neither does Bloomberg News. Track investments 24 hours a day from around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show Ep12
programme.desc: Gary Gensler, SEC Chairman. Financier David Rubenstein talks with the world's most successful investors, who share their investing strategies.

programme.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0 Ep06
programme.desc: Adam Selipsky. Adam Selipsky, CEO of Amazon Web Services, talks about the future of cloud innovation, data privacy, and former AWS head Andy Jassy succeeding Jeff Bezos.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: With Tom Keene, Jonathan Ferro, and Lisa Abramowicz from New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg: the Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Villa Angker Lembang
programme.desc: When an offer seems too good to be true, it probably is. Kemal buys into a haunted resort, and now he must fight for the survival of his family.

programme.title: Roh
programme.desc: Deep in a forest, a prophecy of death by a strange child unleashes terrifying events on a mother and her two children. Inspired by a Japanese horror classic, this was Malaysia's submission to the Oscars.

programme.title: Banglo Berkunci
programme.desc: 3 sahabat suka melakukan aktiviti paranormal di tempat-tempat mistik bagi mencari kepastian sama ada benar hantu itu wujud. Mereka telah pergi ke sebuah banglo yang mempunyai sejarah hitam.

programme.title: Telaga Angker
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is killed when she drives her car into a lake. But soon her spirit returns to exact revenge on those who had caused her death.

programme.title: Mistik
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar terjebak dalam satu ekspedisi ilusi di Pulau Bayu Biru yang penuh misteri. Lakonan Lisdawati, Farid Kamil, Cico, Ezat Exist, Julia Hana dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: Eight: Fear The Legend
programme.desc: An old man, fated to collect souls for eternity, seeks atonement after trading his daughter's soul.

programme.title: Memoir
programme.desc: An insurance saleswoman meets an old friend to make a sale. Her friend's house is old and eerie. As she starts to leave, a shadow is following closely behind ...

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after being given a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.

programme.title: Heaven & Hell

programme.title: The Closed Ward
programme.desc: A group of people are mysteriously trapped in an abandoned hospital, with no clue what fate awaits them.

programme.title: Evil Ritual
programme.desc: A frustrated, angst-ridden teenage girl awakens something in the woods when she naively performs an occult ritual to evoke a witch to kill her mother.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: A tale of vengeance that translates as an LSD trip in the sweltering desert heat, replete with satanic cult, biker gang, heavy metal and Nicolas Cage shooting an arrow. Nuff said. A gory fantastical treat!

programme.title: Kolong
programme.desc: In direct need of money, Suri accepts a high-paying job as the caretaker of a blind man, who is said to live in a house haunted by his late wife's spirit.

programme.title: Agramon's Gate
programme.desc: A psychic reader and a medium are invited to a party. A mistake causes something to come over from the other side to haunt the party. They must solve the mystery before it is too late.

programme.title: Office

programme.desc: Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after being given a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.

programme.title: Memory of China

programme.title: Across the Strait

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: Catch the latest news and social changes that are moving China and the world.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: The programme traces the latest development of the current affairs around China.

programme.title: Xin Yang De Gan Zhao
programme.desc: This documentary captures the battle of those connected to the Chinese Communist Party, and the struggle they endured for the country.

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30-minute news program which features news on China and the world.

programme.title: Zhong Liu Ji Shui Ep28
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Zhong Liu Ji Shui Ep29
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: Award-winning director Chang Cheh depicts the struggle of the Shaolin monasteries when the Ching Dynasty sets trap to separate and destroy them.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: In this mind-blowing sequel to the Shaw Brothers' horror hit, zombies run amok, driving doctors to seek a natural cause while the actual one may be supernatural.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: After enduring several trials (including his girlfriend's rape), a man (Chen Wo-Fu) puts his tai chi skills to deadly use.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A jewel thief tries to have a new life as a singer but a series of robberies gets people wondering if he has returned to his old ways.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: The Emperor develops a more deadly Flying Guillotine and trains a squad of women to combat the 'Iron Umbrella' and a band of rebels.

programme.title: Love With the Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: Pauline Wong plays a pregnant student who marries a sympathetic, yet equally heartbroken, passer-by in Jamie Luk's directing debut.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: In this classic, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu take on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh, making this a 4-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: A woman gets involved in a Ching Dynasty salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and dilemmas gone rotten.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: A virtuous lone swordsman who is not without individual weaknesses (Ti Lung) finally decides that it's payback time.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: In this retelling of China's most popular romance, superstar Ivy Ling Po plays a scholar who tries to seduce a servant.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: A stunning snake goddess in human form seduces a young scholar before a Buddhist monk breaks up their union.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: The great martial clans of China seek to meet with the new Sun and Moon Sect leader and hatch a plan to resist invaders from the west.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Playfulness abounds and innocence is lost in this tale of two naughty females who grow up and discover boys together.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: When villains 'Winged Tiger' Teng Fei and 'Underworld King' Yin Te Lung unite, the martial arts world is plunged into chaos. Can this deadly duo be stopped?

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: In Shaw Brothers' showcase for the talented Ling Yun, a young drummer hungry for fame sacrifices everything including love, for his art. Will the prize prove worth the cost?

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Wang Yu heads this film's stellar cast under martial arts master, Chang Cheh. Together, they present beautifully choreographed action scenes.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: Families win and lose fortunes overnight while neighbours swindle each other as stock as speculation madness takes over Hong Kong.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: A hot-headed patriot gets entwined in the collapse of the Qing Dynasty and the rise of the new Chinese republic.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: The Monk, Monkey, Friar Sand and Pig find themselves in a realm where women can only give birth to women unless loved by a man.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: In this wuxia film, two rival swordsmen vie with a power-hungry villain to possess the dangerous 'Peacock Dart'.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: This seminal film adaptation of a 17th century Pu Songling work is the precursor of the famed 'A Chinese Ghost Story'.

programme.title: Lady With a Sword
programme.desc: Director Kao Pao Shu casts Shaw's darling Lily Ho as the embittered swordswoman searching for the man who murdered her sister.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: A superhero (Danny Lee) must save the earth from legions of demons and monsters led by a blonde-haired Demon Princess.

programme.title: Men From the Monastery
programme.desc: The story of Shaolin firebrands Fang Shih-yu, Hung I-kuan, and Hu Huei-chien comes to life in Chang Cheh's rousing kung fu saga.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Inoue Umetsugu's last Shaw film before his untimely death is a testament to the auteur's carefree comic talent.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: This Inoue Umetsugu musical depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching Ping and Pai Hung.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Director Ching Siu-tung won international acclaim for this tale of an underachiever who is assigned to unlock the secret of the gibbon fists tactic.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: Chang Cheh presents his epic vision of the Temple, featuring his favourite leads Ti Lung, David Chiang and Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: The final chapter of Wong Jing's Colour Trilogy. Jordan Chan and Simon Yam bring you into the criminal underworld of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye
programme.desc: Zhou Dong Yu won 2016 MIMF Best Actress for her role in this romance in which a student fakes his own funeral to help the girl he loves deal with her grief.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The formative years of Wong Fei Hung see him defeat the Northern Sea's leader. Recognizing his talent, the Black Tiger's boss, Lei Gong, makes him his godson and one of his Four Tigers.

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: When Ah Long's ex-girlfriend resurfaces after a 10-year absence to take their son away from him, he must make a painful choice about what is best for the boy.

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: An undercover cop attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate from the inside. However, his operation spirals out of control when he becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: In order to meet his girlfriend's financial ultimatum, Siu Long decides to flip a penthouse. However, he ends up living with the other three investors when things go south.

programme.title: The Mafia Lady
programme.desc: A young cop, who vows revenge on his parents' murderer, discovers that one of the key assassins is his sister. How will this affect his vendetta?

programme.title: The Wedding Diary
programme.desc: A fisherman's son plans to marry the daughter of a rich developer. He promises a grand wedding but the cost is too high. He goes gambling and loses everything! Will the wedding go on?

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: This Bruce Lee classic depicts a clash between Chinese Kung Fu and Karate, and was filmed in Europe featuring two international Karate champions in its cast.

programme.title: Love off the Cuff
programme.desc: In this third instalment, can Cherie and Jimmy overcome their seven-year itch? The path to finding the answer is filled with laughter and tears.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman
programme.desc: There's no love lost between a plump manager & a charming lady but find themselves swapping bodies after getting struck by lightning.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a mission to protect Seobok, the first-ever human clone who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Hong Kong Asian Film Festival's opening film by first-time producer, Carina Lau. When a youth who was abandoned by his mother meets a lonely teacher at school, they develop a strong bond.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: This Thai horror flick depicts how a high school student dies during an abortion - and returns to haunt the apartment where she used to live.

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Starring Neo Yau and Kelvin Kwan, this Hong Kong movie portrays young inmates are physically and mentally abused daily in a detention centre.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men lead a reckless life - but when people start turning into zombies across the city, they take on the responsibility of braving the infected district to save others.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: When Dave, a cop, saves the life of a gang leader, he has no idea that the man will continue his violent reign. An attempt to stop them unleashes a demon.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: A girl who faces bullying and humiliation in school. A boy who struggles to come to terms with having a family with close ties to the underworld. What binds them together and what drives them to kill?

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: This multi-nominated movie depicts a young, talented violinist named Wen Feng, who receives a kiss from a mysterious woman. It prompts them to find out the secret of the Kiss Addiction together.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a little girl named Cherry. When her father's crime connections place her in danger, it is up to him to save her.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: An affluent young man decides to carry on his father's legacy by establishing the Mr McDreamy Training Academy with four suitable recruits - to hilarious results.

programme.title: Endgame

programme.title: Unleashed

programme.title: Sedapur Bersama Nana Mahazan Ep02
